section.p:
leabhar dearg a red book –
A Mhàiri, ann an leatsa a tha an leabhar dearg seo? Chan an. Sin an leabhar aig Seumas. ’S ann gorm a tha an leabhar agamsa.
Mary – is this read book yours? No, it isn’t. That is James’ book. My book is blue. td. 33

leabhar gorm a blue book –
A Mhàiri, ann an leatsa a tha an leabhar dearg seo? Chan an. Sin an leabhar aig Seumas. ’S ann gorm a tha an leabhar agamsa.
Mary – is this read book yours? No, it isn’t. That is James’ book. My book is blue. td. 33

cuir ... leabhar ... ... puts a book ... –
Chuir e an leabhar air a’ bhòrd.
He put the book on the table. td. 47

fàg ... leabhar ... ... leaves a book ... –
Dh’fhàg mi mo leabhar anns an sgoil.
I left my book in the school. td. 47
An do dh’fhàg thu do leabhar anns an sgoil? Cha do dh’fhàg. Càit an do dh’fhàg thu do leabhar? Dh’fhàg mi mo leabhar air a bhòrd.
Did you leave your book in the school? No, I didn’t. Where did you leave your book? I left my book on the table. td. 48

leabhar air bòrd a book on a table –
Càit a bheil an leabhar? Tha an leabhar air a’ bhòrd.
Where is the book? The book is on the table. td. 20
Chuir e an leabhar air a’ bhòrd.
He put the book on the table. td. 47
An do dh’fhàg thu do leabhar anns an sgoil? Cha do dh’fhàg. Càit an do dh’fhàg thu do leabhar? Dh’fhàg mi mo leabhar air a bhòrd.
Did you leave your book in the school? No, I didn’t. Where did you leave your book? I left my book on the table. td. 48

leabhar ann am bocsa a book in a box –
Nach robh leabhar anns a’ bhocsa sin? Bha, bha Bìobull ann.
Wasn’t there a book in that box? Yes, there was a Bible (in it). td. 20

leabhar ann an sgoil a book in a school –
Dh’fhàg mi mo leabhar anns an sgoil.
I left my book in the school. td. 47
An do dh’fhàg thu do leabhar anns an sgoil? Cha do dh’fhàg. Càit an do dh’fhàg thu do leabhar? Dh’fhàg mi mo leabhar air a bhòrd.
Did you leave your book in the school? No, I didn’t. Where did you leave your book? I left my book on the table. td. 48
